activities:
Change.org, Inc. and the other companies within the Change.org, Inc. corporate group (collectively, the “Company”) collect from its users (including users in the EU and Switzerland) each person’s name, email address, and mailing address (the “Personal Information”) as part of its standard registration process. If a user elects to sign a petition on the Company’s platform, such user’s Personal Information may be delivered to the intended recipient and/or the creator of such petition. In addition, if a user elects to receive direct communication from a partner organization of the Company, the Company may pass such user’s Personal Information to the partner organization(s). 

The Company may additionally track data relating to the behavior of its users on its website (the “Campaign Activity Information”). Campaign Activity Information is used for internal purposes only to help the Company personalize the experience for each user and to operate, maintain and improve the features and functionality of its website.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line user data; not manually processed.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and/or the Swiss Data Protection and Information Commissioner
